God DAMN that was hard to turn into a formula!!

I got:
(princess=x, prince=y)
x=y+(2(y-(x-((x+y)/2)))-x)

which slowly whittles down to:
x=4(x-y)

Therefore we have a 4:3 ratio (thanks for that word Elle) all the way up.
... So we have the age 4, 8, 12, and any multiple of 4..
... Right?
